Translations.Text: (Okorubeki) dekigoto ga okoru toki
(dare mo) sono okoru no o, usodearu to shinaku naru
(Aru mono wa) hikuku otosa re,(aru mono wa) takaku age rareyou
Sonotoki, daichi wa dai yure ni yureru
Yamayama wa kudakete kuzure
konagona ni natte hisan suru
Sonotoki anata gata wa, 3ttsu no kumi ni wake rareru
Mazu migite no nakama (ga iru). Migite no nakama to wa nanidearou
Mata hidarite no nakama (ga iru). Hidarite no nakama to wa nanidearou
(Shinkō no) sentōnitatsu-sha wa,(rakuen ni oite mo) sentō ni tachi
korera no mono (sentōnitatsu-sha) wa,(arrā no) sokkin ni haberi
shifuku no rakuen no naka ni (sumu)
Mukashikara no mono ga tasū de
kōsei no mono wa wazukadearu
(Kare-ra wa nishiki no orimono o) shiita nedoko no ue ni
mukai atte sore ni yorikakaru
Eien no (waka-sa o tamotsu) shōnen-tachi ga kare-ra no ma o meguri
(te ni te ni) takatsuki ya (kagayaku) mizusashi, kumitate no nomimono sakazuki (o sasageru)
Kare-ra wa, sorede ato no sawa o nokosazu, deisui suru koto mo nai
Mata kajitsu wa, kare-ra no erabu ni makase
shuju no tori no niku wa, kare-ra no konomi no mama
Ōkī kagayaku manazashi no, utsukushī otome wa
chōdo hizō no shinju no yō
(Korera wa) kare-ra no okonai ni taisuru hōshōdearu
Sokode wa, muekina kotoba ya, tsumitsukurina hanashi mo kiku koto wanai
Tada `heian'are, heian'are.' To iu (no o mimi ni suru) dakedearu
Migite no nakama, migite no nakama to wa nanidearou
(Kare-ra wa) toge no nai su~idora no ki
yūyū to minoru tarufu ki (no naka ni sumi)
nagaku nobiru kokage no
taema naku nagareru mizu no ma de
yutakana kudamono ga
taeru koto naku, kinji rareru koto mo naku (torihōdai)
Takaku age rareta (ikai no) fushido ni (tsuku)
Hontōni ware wa, kare-ra (no haigū to shite otome) o tokubetsu ni tsukuri
ka no on'na-ra o (eien ni kegarenai) shojo ni shita
Itoshī, onaji nenpai no mono
(Korera wa) migite no nakama no tamedearu
Mukashi no mono ga dai ikioiruga
kōsei no mono mo ōi
Hidarite no nakama, kare-ra wa nanidearou
(Kare-ra wa) yake kogasu yōna kaze to, nietatsu yu no naka
kokuen no kage ni
suzushiku mo naku, sawayakade mo nai (-chū ni iru)
Kare-ra wa sore izen, yūfukude (kyōraku ni fukeri)
Taizai o aete okashite ita
Soshite itsumo itte ita. `Watashi-tachi wa shinde kara, tsuchi to hone ni nari, hontōni yomigae sa reru nodeshou ka
Watashi-tachi no furui sosen mo (yomigae sa reru no)desu ka
Itte yaru ga ī. `Sōdatomo, mukashi no mono mo kōsei no mono mo
Kanarazu issho ni shōshū sa reru nodearu. Sadame rareta hi no, sadame rareta toki ni
Sonotoki anata gata wa (dōdearou), mayotte (shinri o) kyogidearu to shita mono yo
Kanarazu anata gata wa zakkūmu no ki (no mi) o tabe
sorede hara wa ippai
Sono Ue nietatsu yu o nomu
nodo ga kawaita rakuda ga nomu yō ni
Korega-shinki no hi no, kare-ra no motenashidearu
Ware wa anata gata o tsukutta. Anata gata wa dōshite shinjitsu o shinjiyou to shinai no ka
Anata gata wa, anata gata no shashutsu suru mono (seieki) ni tsuite kangaeta ka
Sore o tsukutta no wa anata gatana no ka, soretomo ware ga sono sōzō-shadearu no ka
Ware wa, anata gata ni shi (ki) o sadameta. Ware wa,(kesshite) dashinuka re tari suru koto wanai
Daga ware wa dōrui no mono de torikae (sedai no kōtai), matawa anata gataga shiranai (hoka no keitai no) mono ni, anata gata o Sō (ri kae)ru
Anata gata wa, tashikani saisho no sōzō o shitte iru. Soredemo naze ryūi shinai no ka
Anata gata wa, anata gata ga tagayasu (hata no) koto o kangaeta ka
Anata gataga sore (shokubutsu) o sodateru no ka, soretomo ware ga sodateru no ka
Moshi ware ga hossurunaraba, sore o kareta kuzu ni shite shimau. Anata gata wa kyōgaku shite yamanai
(Soshite iudearou. ) `Watashi-tachi wa hontōni fusai o kase rareta
Iya, watashi-tachi wa (rōdō no seika o) toriage rareta
Mata anata gata no nomu mizu ni tsuite kangaeta ka
Anata gataga kumo kara (ame o) furaseru no ka, soretomo ware ga furaseru no ka
Ware ga moshi hossurunaraba, sore o shiokaraku suru koto ga dekiru. Anata gata wa dōshite kansha shinai no ka
Anata gata wa, tomoshibi ni tsuite kangaeta ka
Sono (moyasu) ki o, anata gata ga tsukutta no ka, soretomo ware ga tsukutta no ka
Ware wa sore o kyōkun to shi, mata kōya no jūmin no benri no tame ni tsukutta
Dakara idaide ara reru anata no omo no gyomei o tatae nasai
Watashi wa, shizunde yuku hoshi ni kakete chikau
Sore wa hontōni idaina chikaidearu. Moshi anata gata ni wakarunaraba
hontōni kore wa, hijō ni tōtoi kuruāndearu
(Soreha) hizō no keiten no naka ni (kaka rete ari)
kiyome rareta mono no soto, fureru koto ga dekinai
Ban'yū no nushi kara no keijidearu
Kore wa, anata gata ga karonjiru yōna oshiedearou ka
Mata anata gata wa (sore o) kyogidearu to mōshitate, anata gata no kurashi o tateru no ka
Sorenara anata gata wa,(rinjū no hito no tamashī ga) nodo moto o fusagu toki
(suwatte tada) mimamoru bakarina no ka
Ware wa anata ga tayori mo kare ni chikai nodearu. Daga anata gata ni wa mie wa shinai
Anata gataga moshi (raise no) mukui o jogai sa rete iru to iu nonara, anata gata wa naze
sono (tamashī) o (tainai ni) yobimodosanai no ka. Moshi anata gataga, shinjitsu (o katatte iru no)naraba
Moshi kare ga,(arrā) ni chikadzuke rareta monodearunara
(kare ni taisuru hōshō wa) anshin to man'etsu, soshite shifuku no rakuendearu
Moshi kare ga, migite no nakamadearunaraba
anata ni heian'are.' To migite no nakama kara (aisatsu sa reru)
Mo shikare ga, uso-tsuki de, mayotta monodearunaraba
nietatsu yu no taigū o uke
goku hi de yaka reyou
Hontōni kore wa, yurugi no nai tashikana shinridearu
Dakara idaide ara reru anata no omo no gyomei o tatae nasai
